column4: is there a guide written yet for how to solve graphics card issues in Gutsy?
because my graphics card seems to not be getting used. it's all going to the CPU.... how do I fix this?
how? when I click on system-->RestrictedDriversManager there's nothing there
do you know what brand your video card is?
hmm, I'm not so sure buddy
k, I'll check that one out.
k, yeah, those links said to go to the restricted drivers manager and select ATI... which isn't an option in my checkbox
it doesn't show a terminal method?
just follow the instructions for feisty
be sure to stop when it starts giving instructions on how to do it for edgy haha
alrighty, not sure how compatible the feisty and edgy things are
it's not that, it's just a terminal method
so the same applies, it's not that you're actually running a feisty program on gutsy
it's just a different installation method
